  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initialize the contents of the frame. itemOnePic sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/32883/potion itemTwoPic sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/32883/potion_2 itemThreePic sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/211681/heart itemFourPic sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/185381/dialog_question

    • displayItem

      public void displayItem(String item)
      Display item. Displays the name, property, property change, cost, and the number already owned of an item.
      Parameters:
      item - the item that needs to be displayed

    • buySelectedItem

      public void buySelectedItem()
      Buy selected item. Takes the 'currently Selected' variable and creates the item it represents the player then buys the Item by calling the buy method.

    • buy

      public void buy(Item purchasedItem)
      Buy. Makes the player purchase the currently selected item, checking if they have enough gold. If the player has selected the lucky dip, another item is randomly selected and added to the players inventory.
      Parameters:
      purchasedItem - the purchased item
